description:
Guru Bunbuku organizes an amazing Buddyfight tournament for Gao, featuring familiar faces and a whole bunch of surprises. Gao reunites with his first Buddy, Drum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: GGG Cup Kaisai! All-Star Dai Shuugou!
GGGカップ開催! オールスター大集合!
The GGG Cup Opens! All-Star, Assemble!
